document_data.mainbody:
izbang Blartknocker was a famous gnome, at least among the inhabitants of Purfbin Doogricks home burrows, sometime before 1372 DR.
Fizbang Blartknocker participated in the historical event known as the Great War of the Burrow that took place in Purfbin Doogricks family home, a gnomish community of little significance. Fizbangs actions during the conflict were famously motivated by his empty stomach.
